title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\PatchConfig
name: PatchConfig
description:
Patch configuration specifications. Contains details on how to apply the patch(es) to a VM instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.PatchConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.apt
params.description: Apt update settings. Use this setting to override the default apt patch rules.

params.name: data.yum
params.description: Yum update settings. Use this setting to override the default yum patch rules.

params.name: data.goo
params.description: Goo update settings. Use this setting to override the default goo patch rules.

params.name: data.zypper
params.description: Zypper update settings. Use this setting to override the default zypper patch rules.

params.name: data.windows_update
params.description: Windows update settings. Use this override the default windows patch rules.

params.name: data.pre_step
params.description: The ExecStep to run before the patch update.

params.name: data.post_step
params.description: The ExecStep to run after the patch update.

params.name: data.mig_instances_allowed
params.description: Allows the patch job to run on Managed instance groups (MIGs).
